short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome estansion for use with Enterprise SecureSlice platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Exterprise Chrome Companion, designed for integration with the SecureSlice platform, is an essential extension that seamlessly transfers the required information from Chrome to SecureSlice. This tool enhances user experience by ensuring efficient and secure data connectivity between the browser and the platform. This extension requires an enterprise account in the SecureSlice platform to function.
